name: Blastphemy
description:
The Demon Hunter called Balen has learned of a Demon Prince in Hell that can grant him unimaginable power. Using his wide array of spells, he travels to the underworld every night to summon demons and kill them, hoping to one day become strong enough to take on the Demon Prince.

Blastphemy is an action roguelike game where players use various spells to fight hordes of demons. In this game, players get to choose what demons are summoned so they can create their own playstyle and make use of their spells the way they see fit.

Controls

Movement - WASD
Spell 1 - LMB
Spell 2 - RMB
Spell 3 - Space
Dragging enemies and spells - Hold LMB
